name: Project MALLOW

But not everything is as it seems: earning stars will allow you and MALLOW to venture further into Paragon Confectionsâ€™ factory, and uncover dangerous...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 or newer, 64-bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 Ghz and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
